machine.name: i5+
machine.tagline: ALL ELECTRIC Advanced Automatic Inline Tray Sealer
machine.hero_subtitle: ALL ELECTRIC Advanced Automatic Inline Tray Sealer
machine.overview_body:
The i5+ is an ALL ELECTRIC advanced automatic inline tray sealer designed for maximum seal force, reliability and energy efficiency. Featuring MPE’s E-RAM sealing technology, the system delivers superior performance with reduced maintenance requirements.

The machine supports recipe-driven automatic setup, process control monitoring and seamless integration with ancillary equipment. Designed for modern production environments, the i5+ provides high throughput while maintaining excellent seal integrity and operational flexibility.
machine.key_features:
E-RAM sealing technology for maximum seal force and superior reliability / life-span
Environmentally friendly ALL ELECTRIC design to reduce energy consumption
MAX-PACK system that pre-empts tray anomalies prior to transfer
Remote viewing and technical support via wireless modem link
FREE direct software upgrades upon release
User customisable RFID security access
Recipe-driven automatic machine set up
Process control monitoring
Category 3 safety system
Up to 20 cycles per minute with seal-only applications
Gas flushing ready (cycles depending on product)
1–4 impression tooling (optional colour coding)
Simplistic manual tool change
Static tray guides and exterior transition plates
Tray size check to stop machine for incorrect tray orientation
Film snap detection system
Active film torque system
Intuitive and customisable HMI design
Right-to-left configuration available
Tray crush avoidance system (advanced design specifications)
Quick-release modular conveyor system for cleaning and maintenance
Ancillary equipment integration (coders, printers, depositors, vision systems etc.)
Phase monitoring protection to prevent surge damage to electrical components

features.title: All-electric
features.short_text: Environmentally friendly design to reduce energy consumption.

features.title: E-RAM sealing technology
features.short_text: Maximum seal force with minimal maintenance and long service life.

features.title: MAX-PACK tray anomaly detection
features.short_text: Pre-empts tray anomalies prior to transfer.

features.title: Remote support ready
features.short_text: Remote viewing and technical support via wireless modem link.

features.title: High throughput
features.short_text: Up to 20 CPM seal-only / 14 CPM gas flush (application dependent).

notes.source: Extracted from i5+ Specification Sheet PDF (UK/Europe).
optional_features_from_pdf: High oxygen (High O2) gas flush for red meat applications
Inboard trim and close cut film tooling options
Integration to existing production monitoring software
Advanced audio and visual status system
Lift or slide transfer arms to allow running multi height trays of the same format simultaneously
